Class ArgParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ArgParser

  • public class ArgParser
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to parse the command line arguments for the RSSReader. Derived from code by
    Author:
    Amy Csizmar Dalal CS 204, Spring 2013 date: 9 April 2013

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArgParser()
      The constructor sets default values for the instance variables, in case these are not set by command line options.

      • ArgParser

        public ArgParser()
        The constructor sets default values for the instance variables, in case these are not set by command line options.

    • Method Detail

      • isByDate

        public boolean isByDate()
        Retrieves the current value of the "sort by date" flag.
        Returns:
        true if we should sort the posts by date, false otherwise

      • setByDate

        public void setByDate()
        Turn on the "sort by date" flag. Automatically turns off "sort by alpha" flag.

      • isByAlpha

        public boolean isByAlpha()
        Retrieves the current value of the "sort by alpha" flag.
        Returns:
        true if we should sort the posts alphabetically, false otherwise

      • setByAlpha

        public void setByAlpha()
        Turn on the "sort by alpha" flag. Automatically turns off the "sort by date" flag.

      • isNewest

        public boolean isNewest()
        Retrieves the current value of the "show newest" flag.
        Returns:
        true if we should only display the stories posted or updated since the last time the feed parser was run, false otherwise

      • setNewest

        public void setNewest()
        Turn on the "show newest" flag.

      • isDescription

        public boolean isDescription()
        Retrieves the current value of the "show description" flag.
        Returns:
        true if we should display the post's description, false otherwise

      • setDescription

        public void setDescription()
        Turn on the "show description" flag.

      • getNumber

        public int getNumber()
        Returns the number of posts per feed to display.
        Returns:
        the number of posts to display

        Sets the number of posts per feed to display
        Parameters:
        number - the number of posts

        Sets the REGEX with which to match feed titles.
        Parameters:
